column4: if you're running several apps that run on some sort of VM (Mono, in this case), does each app open it's own VM, or do they all share the VM?
vm requires an operating system of some  sort.. that is you can run winxp  in a vm and programs within that vm in windows.. mostly apps in a vm run only within the vm not individual windows.
wrong sort of VM.  I mean VM, like interpreted languages, as in C#, java, etc.
ah..ok.. well I tried. not sure about your situation.. I'm not a programmer..
